content: In those days Hezekiah was stricken with a terminal illness. The prophet Isaiah son of Amoz visited him and told him, “This is what the  says, ‘Give instructions to your household, for you are about to die; you will not get well.’”
Hezekiah turned his face to the wall and prayed to the ,
“Please, . Remember how I have served you faithfully and with wholehearted devotion, and how I have carried out your will.” Then Hezekiah wept bitterly.
The s message came to Isaiah,
“Go and tell Hezekiah: ‘This is what the  God of your ancestor David says: “I have heard your prayer; I have seen your tears. Look, I will add fifteen years to your life.
I will also rescue you and this city from the king of Assyria. I will shield this city.”’”
Isaiah replied, “This is your sign from the  confirming that the  will do what he has said:
Look, I will make the shadow go back ten steps on the stairs of Ahaz.” And then the shadow went back ten steps.
